jgame.sprite

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • jgame.sprite.Animation

  • public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for changing the indexes of the sprite's sequence in order to make it an animation
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    David Almeida

      • startNewAnimation

        public void startNewAnimation(int maxIndex,
                              long time)
        Parameters:
        maxIndex - the maximum index of the animation, that is, the maximum number of indexes that animation as to go through
        time - the duration of the animation

        Starts the animation

        Since:
        1.0

      • createNewSpriteChangeTask

        private void createNewSpriteChangeTask(int maxIndex)
        Parameters:
        maxIndex - the maximum index of the animation, that is, the maximum number of indexes that animation as to go through

        Creates a new timer task for the animation, this method will be called when starting a new animation

        Since:
        1.0
